detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.

Soft nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in soft bouclé yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in jersey with a low-cut neckline at the back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Scarf in a patterned silk weave. Size 53x53 cm.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels and long dolman sleeves. Welt side pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Top in soft jersey with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow at the waist, and discreet side pockets.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, textured-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with an intarsia motif, embroidery and appliqués. Buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shacket in heavy jersey with shimmering metallic sequins. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and concealed front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with press-studs.
Calf-length kimono in patterned satin with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shoulder seams with a frill trim, long sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam, and elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a seam at the hips. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Short jacket in soft pile with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a shaped neckline front and back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.Draped tie detail at the hem and elastication at the back of the hem.

Set with a hooded top and trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with an unlined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted top with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.

Ankle boots with a zip in one side, round toes, a decorative seam at the front and covered block heels. Cotton canvas linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Metal keyring with a faux fur pompom and a glittery, printed notebook. Size approx. 5x7.5 cm.

Trousers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Captain’s cap in felted fabric containing some wool with a bead-embroidered appliqué on the front. Lined.

Short-style padded jacket with a stand-up collar, hood with a faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal side pockets with a flap and press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shorts in pima cotton twill with a high waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and slightly wider legs with pleats at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Small purse in imitation leather with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Four card slots. Lined. Size 2x9x11.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with hole-knit sections. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Thong body in soft microfibre with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a low-cut back and lined gusset and string back. Seamless.
Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved tulle dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined with a sleeveless, sewn-in jersey dress.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Tights that provide support for the tummy, thighs and calves as well as encouraging good circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist and extra space for a growing tummy. 70 denier.
Short jacket in woven fabric decorated with sequined fabric flowers on the front. Concealed fastener at the neckline and long sleeves. Lined.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suede ankle boots with open heels and toes, a wide elastic gore at the back and covered block heels. Soft leather linings and insoles and rubber soles Heel 8.5 cm.

Shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke at the back with a pleat and hanger. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with cuff plackets and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin with a square neckline and narrow shoulder straps. Shaping darts at the top and a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, concealed side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt with box pleats for added width. Lined bodice.
Leather card holder with four card compartments and one note compartment. Size 7x9.5 cm.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sleeveless playsuit in patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the neckline. Elasticated seam and bow at the waist and rounded, gathered side pockets.
Hats in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Double-layered hats in soft, patterned cotton jersey. One with sewn-on ears at the top.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

No-show trainer socks in fast-drying, functional yarn. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a concealed silicone trim around the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in viscose jersey.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Trainers in a cotton weave with lacing at the front, soft insoles and fluted soles.
Padded laptop case in soft, grained leather with a zip. Cotton twill lining. Size 24.5x33.5 cm. Suitable for laptops up to 13".
Waist bag with a sheen. Large, zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size approx. 5x13x27 cm.
Top in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Cotton-blend jumper in a sturdy fine knit with low dropped shoulders with a double flounce and long sleeves.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.

Waterproof trainers in mesh and imitation leather with hook and loop fasteners at the front, a loop at the back and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, knot detail and cut-out section at the front, seam below the bust and A-line skirt. Lined bodice.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide trim at the hem.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.5 cm.
Top in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with short, tassel-trimmed, double-flounced sleeves (sizes 2-4Y with fringing).
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered, ankle-length legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist, straps that cross at the back and have adjustable buttoning at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.
